name: Eldritch Survivors
storyline:
"Eh, what…? Why am I suddenly so sleepy? No, this can't be…"

The protagonist suddenly falls asleep and awakens in a strange place.

Without thinking, she steps outside, only to meet a brutal death at the hands of monsters.

However, instead of waking up from a dream, she finds herself awakening once again in the exact strange location.

No matter how many times she steps outside, she continues to face the same horrifying deaths and moments of terror.

Meanwhile, unfamiliar individuals, each with their own reasons, find themselves trapped in the same situation.

Will they be able to unravel the tangled threads of their fate and find a way to escape this nightmare?
summary: Uncover the secrets behind the protagonists' fate, trapped in an endless cycle of death. Eldritch Survivor is a survival-like game that maximizes both the narrative and the excitement of each dungeon encounter. Immerse yourself in a 99% pure Lovecraftian world and confront the terror of the unknown.
